name: Brickboy
description:
Brickboy is a roguelite brick-breaking action platformer made by a college student with too much time on his hands. Adventure through 5 unique biomes to rescue the remnants of a lost civilization of brickboys!

-Build, dig, survive, and toss bricks!

-Acquire powerups!

-Up to 4 player local coop and vs mode!

-Controller support!

-Meta progression system!

-Boss fights!

-Multiple endings!

-Day/Night cycle!

-Base defense!

-Procedurally generated biomes!

!WARNING!

Although it looks cute, this game is very difficult!
